content: Abuela. I can finally see. You lost your home. Lost everything. You suffered so much, all alone, so it would never happen again. We were saved because of you. We were given a miracle, because of you. We are a family because of you. And nothing could ever be broken that we can't fix... together. I asked my Pedro for help. Mirabel. He sent me you.
author: Jared Bush et al.
